items.sentence: I don\'t think I\'ll ever sound like a native speaker.
I don\'t yet know how much money we\'re going to need.
Why didn\'t you tell me you didn\'t understand French?
Tom knew that he couldn\'t get to the airport by 2:30.
She has a tendency to look on the dark side of things.
She is accustomed to doing her homework before dinner.
She visits him quite often, but never stays very long.
Slavery has been abolished in most parts of the world.
I didn\'t even know that you knew how to speak French.
I didn\'t know Tom used to be a professional musician.
